fi.luupanu.skrapple.utils

Class Announcer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.luupanu.skrapple.utils.Announcer

  • public class Announcer
extends Object
    Announcer is used to announce game changes to the players using Announcements.
    Author:
    panu
